title: (x) Antonio Marras embroided name tag - MT Grotesque XCd {Yves}
content:
Hello,  
I have a huge problem to identify this font. Font-specialised websites were not able to help me.  
Maybe one of you could give me more informations?  
Thanks a lot in advance!

[URL=http://img299.imageshack.us/my.php?image=etiquette4fo.jpg][IMG]http://img299.imageshack.us/img299/1223/etiquette4fo.th.jpg[/IMG][/URL]

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [sample.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20080408103902/http:/typophile.com/files/sample_12.jpg) | 264.02 KB |

 [‹ (x) Dwell magazine nameplate - (similar to) Trade Gothic {Stephen}](http://web.archive.org/web/20080408103902/http:/www.typophile.com/node/15537 "Go to previous forum topic") [(x) Churchill Downs Inc. logo - Stone Print {Yves} ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080408103902/http:/www.typophile.com/node/15580 "Go to next forum topic")
author: m-tigre

comments.content:
You’d have better luck getting an id with the sleuths in the ID section.  
Would somebody move this thread?

R

I think this is [Monotype Grotesque Extra Condensed](http://web.archive.org/web/20080408103902/http:/www.fontshop.com/index.cfm?fuseaction=catalog.fontdetail&displayfontid=M.103092.0.4&attributes.sampleSize=48&sampleText=antonio+marras+d%C3%A9fil%C3%A9&sampleSize=48). As it was stitched/embroidered this might explain the little differences.

’ [Bureau Grotesque](http://web.archive.org/web/20080408103902/http:/www.fontbureau.com/fonts/BureauGrotesque)’ may get you close, as well..  
_( Or did I just make a fool of myself and ’Monotype Grotesque’ = ’Bureau Grotesque’.? :)_

Dav, [formlos](http://web.archive.org/web/20080408103902/http:/www.formlos.net/)
Well, not exactly — FBi’s Grotesque is based on similar models, but looks decidedly American, while Monotype’s is very British.

Yea, I thought so, but I couldnt quite get the FontShop site to work.. _( And, I cant stand getting redirected to the Austrian sub site.. I also may admit that I prefer the FontBureau one of those two.. )_

Dav, [formlos](http://web.archive.org/web/20080408103902/http:/www.formlos.net/)

Well, I’ve always had a soft spot for the regular width [Light](http://web.archive.org/web/20080408103902/http:/www.fontshop.com/showfont.cfm?fid=C.6074.0.1) and [Normal](http://web.archive.org/web/20080408103902/http:/www.fontshop.com/showfont.cfm?fid=C.6074.0.3) weight of the Monotype version — deliciously quirky with that weird balance and nice vintage stroke modulation. Though I agree the FBi version is very beautiful as well.
